title: Cinnamon-flavoured apple and sultana clafoutis
ingredients: ['75 g (2¾ oz) plain white flour, sifted', '75 g (2¾ oz) caster sugar', '3 eggs', '300 ml (10 fl oz) skimmed milk', '1 tablespoon Calvados or other fruit brandy, optional', '450 g (1 lb) cooking apples, peeled, cut into quarters, cored and thickly sliced', '50 g (1¾ oz) sultanas or raisins', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, allspice or mixed spice']
